name: @smithery/cli
description: A NPX command to install and list Model Context Protocols from Smithery

scripts.package:win: rimraf dist/bin && node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('dist/bin', { recursive: true })" && node -e "require('fs').copyFileSync(process.execPath, 'dist/bin/smithery.exe')" && npx postject dist/bin/smithery.exe NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2
scripts.package:linux: mkdir -p dist/bin && cp $(command -v node) dist/bin/smithery-linux && npx postject dist/bin/smithery-linux NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 && chmod +x dist/bin/smithery-linux
scripts.package:mac: mkdir -p dist/bin && cp $(command -v node) dist/bin/smithery-darwin && codesign --remove-signature dist/bin/smithery-darwin && npx postject dist/bin/smithery-darwin NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --macho-segment-name NODE_SEA && chmod +x dist/bin/smithery-darwin && codesign --sign - dist/bin/smithery-darwin
scripts.package: npm run package:clean && npm run package:config && npm run package:blob && tsx scripts/package-platform.ts
